paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the characteristics and outcomes of patients with grade 1 myocardial uptake on cardiac scintigraphy, including genetic testing for TTR mutations. One variant in the TTR gene was identified.

individual_records.phenotype_details: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy based on clinical presentation and CMR findings
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This patient was diagnosed with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy based on his clinical presentation and CMR findings.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was found in a single patient.
variants.additional_notes: The patient also carried a homozygous pathogenic mutation in the TNNI3 gene and a variant of unknown significance in the MYBPC3 gene.
key_quotes: This patient was diagnosed with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy based on his clinical presentation and CMR findings.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was identified in the paper.
